name: Fariha!!!
wishText: May the luck always be with you whatever you do! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! I hope you are doing well. Although our friendship was short, felt like a meaningful one. I know you have your reasons for ghosting, but I already knew it. Didn't I? But, you know what? I am just happy you know me now. I just wanted you to know me. By the way, I miss those little arguments on national and international topics. Anyway, Greetings on your wedding! May Allah keep all the evils away from you and fulfill all of your dreams. Happy Birthday Once Again. Best of Luck for the year.
text4: Chatro League Voyongkor Rupe fire ashbe.
text5Content: Because, You are still a cute little non-venomous, non-lethal fast-striking human. Okay! Not Littol Anymore
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again. Tadah
